data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 5, Sendai are whistled for offside.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 12, Kashima needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Kashima surge into the attack at Kashima Soccer Stadium but Everaldo’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Sendai at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 17, Minoru Tojo signals a Sendai throw-in in Kashima's half.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 19, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima.
Takuma Hamasaki is booked for the away team.
In the minute 23, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Sendai.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Everaldo (Kashima) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Sendai defenders.
In the minute 29, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kim Jung-Ya is replacing Kyohei Yoshino for the away team.
In the minute 32, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Shoma Doi (Kashima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Sendai advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sendai at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 37, Kashima are coming forward and Juan Alano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Sendai's Alexandre Guedes misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Sendai at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 44, Kashima push forward at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Everaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sendai defence.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 45, Sendai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Kashima.
Everaldo heads in to make it 1-0 at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 45, Great play from Kei Koizumi to set up the goal.
The second half has started at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Kashima!
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 52, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo signals a Kashima throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 53, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sendai make their second substitution with Shun Nagasawa replacing Ryo Germain.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Minoru Tojo awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Kashima are caught offside.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Yasushi Endo is replacing Shoma Doi for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
The home team have replaced Everaldo with Ayase Ueda. This is the second substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 63, Kunimitsu Sekiguchi (Sendai) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Sendai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 67, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Juan Alano of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 70, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a fourth substitution, with Shingo Hyodo replacing Kunimitsu Sekiguchi.
Takayoshi Ishihara is on a sub for Alexandre Guedes for Sendai.
Shingo Hyodo (Sendai) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 72, Zago is making the team's fourth substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Ryuji Izumi replacing Ryotaro Araki.
Shun Nagasawa (Sendai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
The home team replace Juan Alano with Leo Silva.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 78, Kashima's Yasushi Endo is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Ayase Ueda puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Katsuya Nagato instrumental with a fine assist.
Kashima make their fifth substitution with Tatsuki Nara replacing Ryota Nagaki.
In the minute 87, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Shun Nagasawa puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Kashima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Kashima Soccer Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sendai at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Kashima.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sendai defender.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Free kick Kashima.
Kashima are in shooting range from this free kick.
The match has come to a close in Kashima. The final score is 2-1.
Keiya Shiihashi (Sendai) has received a yellow card from Minoru Tojo.
